description: perfromance platform schema for: user-satisfaction multiple quantitative based question plus comment records. Quantitative question rated 1 to 5, 1 being the lowest, 5 being the highest. the comment is the last question. Schema shows 6 questions plus one comments question (question 7)
title: user-satisfaction-multi-question

____timestamp.description: ISO8601 combined date and time in UTC e.g. '2014-12-01T00:00:00+00:00'

___rating_3.description: the number of respondents answering with the middle ranked score

___rating_4.description: the number of respondents answering with the second highest ranked score

___rating_5.description: the number of respondents answering with the highest ranked score

____id.description: unique url-friendly base64 encoded, utf8 endoded concatenation identifier

___period.description: The period covered by each data point from the _timestamp

___rating_1.description: the number of respondents answering with the lowest ranked score

___total_respondents.description: the total number of respondents undertaking the user-satisfaction questionnaire

___rating_2.description: the number of respondents answering with the second lowest ranked score

___respondents.description: the number of respondents responding the specific question - respondents may choose not to answer all survey questions
